# Privacy Policy for Sky Wallet

Welcome to Sky Wallet. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your data when you use our cryptocurrency wallet application.

  • ## 1. No Collection of Personal Data

    Sky Wallet is a cold wallet, meaning all your data is stored locally on your device.

    We do not collect, store, or process any of the following:


    - Personal information (such as name, email, phone number, etc.)

    - Cryptocurrency wallet addresses

    - Private keys or seed phrases

    - Transaction history


    All wallet-related data remains under your control and is never transmitted to us.

  • ## 2. Third-Party APIs

    To enhance functionality, Sky Wallet integrates with third-party APIs to:


    - Retrieve real-time cryptocurrency prices

    - Check balances associated with your wallet addresses


    These APIs are used only for fetching publicly available blockchain data.

    We do not intercept, modify, or store any of this information.

    Your data remains private and secure.

  • ## 3. No Tracking or Analytics

    Sky Wallet does not use:


    - Cookies

    - Tracking technologies

    - Analytics services

    - Advertisements


    We do not track your activities within the app or share data with third parties.

  • ## 4. Security

    Since all private keys and wallet information are stored locally on your device, you are solely responsible for securing your device and backup keys.

    We strongly recommend:


    - Using strong passwords

    - Enabling device security features

    - Keeping your backup keys secure and private


    We cannot recover lost or stolen private keys,
    as we do not have access to them.

  • ## 5. Changes to This Policy

    We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page, and we encourage you to review it periodically.

  • ## 6. Contact Information

    For any privacy-related inquiries, please refer to the contact details provided on our website or our Google Play Store listing.


    By using Sky Wallet, you acknowledge and agree to this Privacy Policy. Your security and privacy are our priority.

Terms and Conditions for Crypto Wallet

Sky Wallet © 2023
  • By using this crypto wallet, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
  • Non-Collection of Information:

    The creators of this wallet explicitly state that we do not collect or store any information, including wallet addresses and private keys.

  • No Responsibility for Losses:

    The creators are not responsible for any losses, damages, or security breaches that may occur during the use of this wallet. You are solely responsible for your own cryptocurrency assets and security.

  • No Contact from Creators:

    The creators of this wallet will never initiate contact with you. Please be cautious of any unsolicited communication claiming to be from us.

  • Security:

    While we do not collect information, it's essential to take security measures to protect your assets, as we cannot guarantee complete security. Users are encouraged to follow best practices for safeguarding their private keys and wallet access.

  • Terms of Use:

    Your use of this wallet is subject to compliance with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction. Any misuse, illegal activities, or violations will result in the termination of your access to the wallet.

  • Modification of Terms:

    These terms may be updated or modified without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review the terms periodically.

  • Disclaimer:

    This wallet is provided "as is" without any warranties or guarantees. The creators make no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy, functionality, or reliability of the wallet.

  • Indemnity:

    By using this wallet, you agree to indemnify and hold the creators harmless from any claims, losses, or damages, including legal fees.

  • Termination of Service:

    The creators reserve the right to terminate or suspend the wallet service at any time, without liability.

  • Governing Law:

    These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of [Your jurisdiction]. By using this crypto wallet, you acknowledge and accept these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please refrain from using the wallet.

  • Non-Monetary Gain:

    The creators of this wallet project do not, and will not, gain any monetary profit or financial benefits from its usage.
